releases.title: Spike (riscv-isa-sim) 0bc176b3
commands: mkdir -p $GITHUB_WORKSPACE/upload/spike_0bc176b3//spike-x86_64-linux-gnu-ubuntu-20.04 && ./build-riscv-tools.sh --compress --force --setup spike spike_min --docker ubuntu:20.04 --dest $GITHUB_WORKSPACE/upload/spike_0bc176b3//spike-x86_64-linux-gnu-ubuntu-20.04 SPIKE_REF=0bc176b3 && mv $GITHUB_WORKSPACE/upload/spike_0bc176b3//spike-x86_64-linux-gnu-ubuntu-20.04/spike.tar.xz $GITHUB_WORKSPACE/upload/spike_0bc176b3//spike-x86_64-linux-gnu-ubuntu-20.04.tar.xz && mv $GITHUB_WORKSPACE/upload/spike_0bc176b3//spike-x86_64-linux-gnu-ubuntu-20.04/spike_min.tar.xz $GITHUB_WORKSPACE/upload/spike_0bc176b3//spike_min-x86_64-linux-gnu-ubuntu-20.04.tar.xz

mkdir -p $GITHUB_WORKSPACE/upload/spike_0bc176b3//spike-x86_64-linux-gnu-ubuntu-22.04 && ./build-riscv-tools.sh --compress --force --setup spike spike_min --docker ubuntu:22.04 --dest $GITHUB_WORKSPACE/upload/spike_0bc176b3//spike-x86_64-linux-gnu-ubuntu-22.04 SPIKE_REF=0bc176b3 && mv $GITHUB_WORKSPACE/upload/spike_0bc176b3//spike-x86_64-linux-gnu-ubuntu-22.04/spike.tar.xz $GITHUB_WORKSPACE/upload/spike_0bc176b3//spike-x86_64-linux-gnu-ubuntu-22.04.tar.xz && mv $GITHUB_WORKSPACE/upload/spike_0bc176b3//spike-x86_64-linux-gnu-ubuntu-22.04/spike_min.tar.xz $GITHUB_WORKSPACE/upload/spike_0bc176b3//spike_min-x86_64-linux-gnu-ubuntu-22.04.tar.xz

mkdir -p $GITHUB_WORKSPACE/upload/spike_0bc176b3//spike-x86_64-linux-gnu-ubuntu-24.04 && ./build-riscv-tools.sh --compress --force --setup spike spike_min --docker ubuntu:24.04 --dest $GITHUB_WORKSPACE/upload/spike_0bc176b3//spike-x86_64-linux-gnu-ubuntu-24.04 SPIKE_REF=0bc176b3 SPIKE_FIX=0a7bb54 && mv $GITHUB_WORKSPACE/upload/spike_0bc176b3//spike-x86_64-linux-gnu-ubuntu-24.04/spike.tar.xz $GITHUB_WORKSPACE/upload/spike_0bc176b3//spike-x86_64-linux-gnu-ubuntu-24.04.tar.xz && mv $GITHUB_WORKSPACE/upload/spike_0bc176b3//spike-x86_64-linux-gnu-ubuntu-24.04/spike_min.tar.xz $GITHUB_WORKSPACE/upload/spike_0bc176b3//spike_min-x86_64-linux-gnu-ubuntu-24.04.tar.xz
